explanation: [0-0] Three people are standing on a lawn in front of a residential building. On the left is a man wearing a black vest and printed trousers, with a black bucket hat. In the middle and on the right are two women, both wearing black T-shirts. They are standing in front of a tall building, and the image is divided into four squares by a white dotted cross.

[0-3] Subsequently, the man raises his hands and grabs the hair of the two women, who hug each other. Then, a 3, 2, 1 countdown appears in the upper left square, after which the image in that square freezes.

[3-10] Next, the two women stick out their tongues. At the same time, a 3, 2, 1 countdown appears in the upper right square, and then the image in that square freezes. Subsequently, a 3, 2, 1 countdown also appears in the lower left square, and then that image freezes.

[10-13] Then, a 3, 2, 1 countdown appears in the lower right square, and at the same time, the two women leave the frame. When the countdown ends, the image in the lower right square freezes. Finally, the image forms a photo of a man in a black vest, printed trousers, and a bucket hat, grabbing two women on the right who are sticking out their tongues. Only the heads of the women are visible, without their bodies.
